committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to permit trapping in the Ozark National Scenic Riverways area.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to conduct a study of trapping for fur bearing mammals as a wildlife management activity within the Ozark National Scenic Riverways. Requires the Secretary to submit the study, together with appropriate recommendations, to specified congressional committees.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to permit trapping in the Ozark National Scenic Riverways area.
